backend/main.mo: Defines an actor storing interest entries and adds new entries unless a duplicate parent/email pair exists.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for major frontend files describing their roles in the application.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Provides a deployment verification checklist covering routes, decorations, assets, handbook behavior, and contingency steps.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with all page routes wrapped in the SiteLayout component.
frontend/src/components/InterestListForm: Form component handling validation and backend submission for interest list entries with success/error states.
frontend/src/components/ParentHandbookAc: Accordion component rendering seven handbook summary sections.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper rendering TopNav and routed content via Outlet.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Sticky navigation bar listing all site routes using shadcn NavigationMenu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login state, identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module for future React Query hooks; currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark modes, including typography and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page describing program philosophy, preschool model, language approach, and leadership.
frontend/src/pages/ContactInterestListPa: Displays the interest list form and program contact information for families.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page presenting an overview of the Little Sprouts Garden Club with visuals, program details, and a link to learn more.
frontend/src/pages/LittleSproutsPage.tsx: Shows full details of the Little Sprouts program, including schedule, activities, and contact information.
frontend/src/pages/ParentHandbookPage.ts: Provides access to the Parent Handbook PDF with fallback messaging and displays handbook sections via an accordion.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramPage.tsx: Renders the Program page with sections describing program details, curriculum, outdoor learning, and inclusion values.
frontend/src/pages/TuitionPage.tsx: Displays tuition information including overview, projected rates, and a list of what tuition includes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, spacing, typography, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animation.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature tracking, required image assets, and pending feature requests for removing capacity wording and adding flower illustrations.
